column4: hello, i installed ubuntu a few hours ago and im having a few issues that are frustrating me to no end. is there anyone available to help?
im sorry, what do you mean by browse what?
alright ill look through there, thanks
do you have the smp kernel?
as the right devices? or unknown vendor etc?
its showing 90% unknown devices, but all of the vendors are labled correctly it seems.
is this a very new box?
give it time for the developers to catch up.
the comp's a year old, but i just wasnt sure if it was normal for the device manager to neglect to show any activity or labeling.
